title: Readings in Sino-Korean Characters
description: Students in this course will learn advanced and superior level Sino-Korean vocabulary and characters, skills in reading and understanding advanced and superior level Korean reading materials, and expand their understanding of Korean culture. Upon completion of this course, students are expected to have acquired an expanded vocabulary, knowledge of various expressions using Sino-Korean vocabulary and characters.  Prerequisites:  LTKO 2C or equivalent level of proficiency with consent of instructor.
